phrases: How many times do I have to tell you before you can get it in your head?!
Shirokawa, do not dye your hair!
Button your shirt up to the second button!
Fasten your belt at your waist!
Do not step on the heels of your shoes!
This is what you should look like!
This school is full of savages!
Hey, Yukimura, did you manage to complete that guide?
If we do not enforce it, the boys will start being lazy again!
It is only been a few years since Seika High became a coed school.
Since it used to be an all-male school, the males still comprise 80 of the school's population.
And in the midst of that, I am the first female to become the Student Council President.
Now that I stand in this position, I will not let the boys do whatever they please!
Now that I think of it, I have witnessed so many disgusting things ever since I first entered the school.
All the powerless girls could do in front of those men throwing their weight around was to endure the horror.
So, I worked hard in order to change the situation.
I did not forget to act friendly, either.
And so, I gained the teachers' trust,
and obtained my current status as the Student Council President.
Come on, I am asking for your help.
B-But I have something I need to attend to...
Those who neglect their duties will instead be given bathroom cleaning duties for a week.
That is what I should be saying, Moron Trio!
Who are you calling a Moron Trio?!
Idiots like you are not worthy of being called by their names!
And I told you earlier to fix your appearances!
Yeah, yeah, I will take them off later.
I said I will take them off!
Are you trying to tear his ears off?!
You have got cleaning duty left!
The guy who is always making girls cry.
I have told you countless times to be more sensitive when choosing your words!
You are going to pay if I catch you bringing another girl to tears!
How many times has she told me that?
I wonder why the Prez hates guys so much.
Cannot you find a way to somehow make her say'uncle', Usui-san?
I hate guys who make girls cry.
It is going to take money to fix them again.
Oh, looks like you are home, Sis.
What is with this trap, Suzuna?!
I accidentally put my foot through it earlier.
Seems like the floorboard was rotten.
So you thought it would be wise to just hide it under a sheet of newspaper?
You fell in it as planned.
You had a night shift at the hospital, right?
You do not exactly have a strong constitution, so you should not overwork yourself.
I cannot just put all the burden on you.
I need to shape up as well, you know?
If only Dad had not disappeared after leaving a debt.
Oh, there was a call from the chief where you work.
Apparently, one of the workers cannot come, so she wants you to take her place.
I have to leave now, then!
Why did not you tell me that earlier?
I almost fell in that hole again!
Sis, could you drop this in the postbox while you are out?
Try to rest up a bit, Mom!
I will be on my way!
We are poor, but Sis definitely needs a cell.
Sorry for asking you to take over so suddenly.
I have got various expenses to meet this month, so it was actually a good opportunity.
Can I get one Moe Moe Omelet Rice?
I will bring one out right away, Master.
I have worked here for so long, but I still cannot get used to this place.
I do not have much free time because of student council work,
so I needed a well-paying job like this one, but...
If someone from school were to see me like this...
If it is not the Prez.
This is the worst situation imaginable.
The whole school will definitely know about it.
Everything will be harder if they realize that the Student Council President is a maid...
The trust I have been building up until now is on its way down the drain...
There is something strange-looking on the ground!
Oh, you are dressed normally now.
I just wanted to make sure.
So that maid really was the Prez...
Why are you working at a place like this?
I will be off now, Chief!
Let us take this somewhere else.
Just shut up and follow me!
So, that is why you are working at a maid cafe in a neighboring town.
Could not you have done some physical labor near home instead?
I did not have that kind of stamina.
Being the President, I cannot allow my grades to drop.
Oh, so the reason you attend Seika, a school full of guys, despite hating men...
I cannot tell what this guy's thinking.
I refuse to let something like this...
I have got a rough road ahead of me...
It is been three days since then...
My grandpa says that before he dies, he wants to have the picture he took with a female high school student made...
The t-shirt I bought from Made In Tochigi the other day does not really fit me...
I cannot help but overreact towards anything that sounds like the word'maid'.
But it is strange that no one has found out about it yet...
Is he planning to blackmail me with that?
Or perhaps, he is feeling sympathetic...
Irritating, but that would probably be for the best.
Sorry, I was just doing some thinking.
Sorry to do this when you have so much to worry about, but...
We actually need a favor from you.
We cannot get to the flower arrangement club because this thing's in the way.
I will lecture the boxing club members about this later.
Guess we should probably move this first.
But this thing smells and it is really really heavy...
Hurry up and put this where it belongs!
It is a lot easier than throwing somebody.
Is that Usui-kun looking this way?
What was that supposed to mean?
I heard he was practicing Shorinji Kempo up through middle school, and people say he is really strong!
All the guys look up to him, and his grades are also consistently excellent.
He is the ray of light in our school, which is otherwise nothing but filthy boys!
But I heard he is not even interested in girls anymore, since he is so popular.
But people still confess to him.
I do not understand how these girls' minds work.
Maybe he does not really care about the maid thing because he is uninterested?
Why are you here as a customer?!
I do not get it... what is he up to?
Is he here to poke fun at me?
Or to have a battle of willpower?
Hey, hey, is he your boyfriend or something?!
He is been staring at you the entire time!
He is having fun by driving me into a corner mentally.
He sat there for an hour after ordering nothing but a cup of coffee.
I have been so tired lately...
Yo, Takezawa, you went to the same middle school as the Prez, right?
Has she always been like that?
I think she started acting like that since the second year of middle school.
I heard a lot went on in her house.
Wait, it is rare of you to talk about girls.
Does not he get that people are starting to notice him?
He is only watching because he is amused.
There is no way he is worried.
You got second place on the mock exam!
Do not screw around with me!
He is probably just having fun by laughing at me, since I do not have much time to spare.
I feel like I am being looked down upon.
What, just having some gravure images makes them'indecent'?
Besides, how come girls are allowed to have magazines while we are not?!
You are being too harsh on us; I do not think you are giving us equal rights!
If you are going to enforce the rules with us, you need to be harsher to the girls too!
I will review the case after checking the content of the magazines.
Those that are just simply inappropriate for school are banned.
Let me know the names of the magazines you would like to read at school.
There is going to be a lot, then.
You seem busy enough already, Misaki.
I need to do this much as the President.
The accounts for last month are not adding up properly...
I told you to at least count the money accurately!!
You seem to enjoy driving yourself into a corner.
Oh, I guess you are a sadist too.
I think you should loosen up a bit.
I do not have the leisure to be tired...
The accounts really will not add up, either...
I need to hurry up and decide which magazines will be allowed, too...
I also need more time than what I have now to study...
I think you should loosen up a bit.
I do not need help from the likes of you!
I feel like I am just halfway doing everything...
I do not feel too well...
Hey, let us call everyone over.
Are you going to run away?
You torment guys all the time at school, and then you are going to tell us that you were actually a maid?
We are going to need some special service then.
Call us your masters or something.
Are not you supposed to be a maid?
Wow, I did not realize you were actually a girl.
Dressing like this actually makes you look-
Do not touch her just because she is darn cute.
I was so shocked when the chief called.
Resting for a day helped clear my mind.
You know, they have not told anyone that you are a maid.
I was actually prepared for it.
Did you do something to them?
I asked them not to spread it around too much,
since it is my secret entertainment.
So you are having fun with it.
I mean, you would get mad if I told you I was actually worried, right?
Well personally, I think it will be okay even if the school finds out about it.
Having a part-time job is not forbidden or anything.
Just because you are dressed like a maid, the fact that you are strong, smart,
and never hesitate to make an effort will not change.
I think you can be proud of it.
I actually spent the whole day yesterday thinking about why you piss me off so much.
Did not I just finish saying something really kind?
It is like, when I am running with all my might,
you are jogging relaxedly a few yards ahead of me.
And then you start running backwards right in my face, and say things to me every once in a while.
I am really competitive, so that made me really mad...
I will pass you soon and when that happens, I will be the one to worry about you.
Oh yeah, thanks for lending me your scarf.
And for a lot of other things.
I was thinking about how I could make it up to you since I hate being indebted, but I could not think of anything.
Why do not you come up with something for me.
Oh, do you have something in mind?
Could you be my personal maid for a day?
Besides, I thought you were not interested in women at all!
I do not have time to be arguing with this guy.
I need to be preparing for the school festival as the Student Council President!
If we do not raise the number of female students, the fact that I became the President will be pointless!
What is this Cat Ear Day?
First, we need to pick a theme for the festival!
It will be called, Neo-Seika High!
I am going to change this school!
